titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to allow volunteer fire departments and emergency rescue squads to receive donations of Federal surplus personal property.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to Subcommittee on Government Activities and Transportation.

bill.summary: 3/3/1987--Introduced. Amends the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to allow nonprofit volunteer fire departments and rescue squads to receive donations of Federal surplus personal property.
